title: What Animal Are You?
description: Discover which animal matches your personality best! Take this 12-question test to find out!

questions.question: How do you start your weekend morning?

choices.text: Wake up early and start the day actively
Sleep in and get up slowly
Get up according to my planned schedule
The life of the party, center of attention
Quiet observer who gives advice when needed
Loyal supporter who helps from behind
My role changes depending on the situation

questions.question: What do you do when stressed?

choices.text: Act differently depending on the situation
Trust my instincts and decide quickly
Analyze the situation and decide strategically

questions.question: How do you feel about alone time?

choices.text: I get bored if alone for too long
Morning person, most active in the morning
Night owl, most active at night
It varies from time to time
Step up to resolve it directly
Quickly pick up only what I need
An active trip with lots of activities
Relaxing time in a quiet place

results.title: Dog
results.description: You have a loyal and passionate personality like a dog! You love being with people and warmly approach everyone. You're full of positive energy and bring vitality to those around you.
results.advice: Sometimes you need alone time too. Take moments to rest for yourself. Don't try to please everyone - focus on relationships that truly matter.

results.title: Cat
results.description: You have an independent and mysterious charm like a cat! You value your own space and time, and observe your surroundings with keen perception. It takes time to get close, but once you open up, you form deep bonds.
results.advice: Sometimes it's good to approach first. Share your charm with more people. It's okay not to be perfectionist all the time.

results.title: Owl
results.description: You are wise and insightful like an owl! You love to think deeply and analyze, quietly observing to understand situations. Your careful decisions earn the trust of those around you.
results.advice: Sometimes trust your instincts and take action. Overthinking might make you miss opportunities. Listen to your heart as well as your head.

results.title: Dolphin
results.description: You are cheerful and social like a dolphin! You brighten the mood wherever you go and enjoy communicating with people. With high empathy, you understand others' emotions well and adapt flexibly to situations.
results.advice: Building deep relationships is also important. Wide connections are great, but cultivate deep relationships where you can truly share your heart.

results.title: Fox
results.description: You are clever and adaptable like a fox! You quickly assess situations and move strategically. You handle various situations flexibly and excel at getting what you need.
results.advice: Don't be afraid to show your true feelings. Don't always think strategically - sometimes approach with a pure heart.

results.title: Rabbit
results.description: You are gentle and considerate like a rabbit! You notice others' needs and help with a warm heart. Though careful and cautious, you pour endless affection on those close to you.
results.advice: Express your own opinions too. While being considerate of others is great, cherish your own needs and feelings as well.

results.title: Bear
results.description: You are comfortable and stable like a bear! Your relaxed personality gives those around you a sense of security. Rather than rushing, you maintain your own pace and value simple everyday happiness.
results.advice: Try new challenges sometimes. Don't just stay in your comfort zone - even small changes can lead you to discover new joys.
